law.history: Repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 113, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 54, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1988.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Criteria for funding local disaster and emergency services organizations.
